snippet: A temporary restraining order was issued against the Center for Medical Progress, which had released secretly recorded meetings of the National Abortion Federation.
lead_paragraph: A temporary restraining order was issued against the Center for Medical Progress, which had released secretly recorded meetings of the National Abortion Federation.

headline.main: Federal Judge Blocks Release of Videos by Anti-Abortion Group
headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Release of Videos by Anti-Abortion Group
